mapper.select: select cart_num, member_id, cart_count, item_price, item_color, item_size, item_reserve, item_image, item_name from cart as A left join item as B on (A.item_num = B.item_num) left join member_info as C on (A.member_num = C.member_num)
mapper.insert: insert into cart(member_num, cart_count, item_num) values(#{member_num}, #{cart_count}, #{item_num})
mapper.select: select sum(item_price*cart_count) from cart as A left join item as B on (A.item_num = B.item_num) left join member_info as C on (A.member_num = C.member_num)
